title: Pregnancy complications and birth outcomes following low-level exposure to per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances in the vitamin D antenatal asthma reduction trial
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00001C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sofina Begum, Nicole Prince, Lidia Mínguez-Alarcón, Yulu Chen, Djøra I. Soeteman, Vrushali Fangal, Mengna Huang, Craig Wheelock, Kevin Mendez, Augusto A. Litonjua, Scott T. Weiss, Jessica Lasky-Su, Rachel S. Kelly
Per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) are a group of synthetic, highly fluorinated aliphatic compounds, commonly utilised in a wide variety of consumer products with diverse applications.
